Title: Sparks of Life: Thaldraszus
Description:
Thaldraszus is thrumming with the renewed energies of the Dragon Isles.

Get out there and take advantage of it.
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Sparks of Life in Thaldraszus, while in War Mode.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
